title: Hegel’s Confession - Novel Updates
tags: Crime   Female Protagonist   Investigations   Murders   Police
author: Wu Heng   无痕
description: As investigating partners, Zhu Xuan always wondered if her boss, Chu Haoran, had multiple personalities? How could he be so proud and obnoxious one minute, then caring and tender the next? One day after work, Haoran put up his long legs on her sofa table, announcing that he was living with her now. Xuan: 'What about your own home?' Haoran: 'There’s no point in resisting!'>
